review: Very useful purchase, I'm from Uruguay (SouthAmerica) and the device works perfectly fine! I was afraid Google Chromecast does not accept my location, but everything worked really good!The main feature of this device is that you can broadcast Youtube videos and Netflix Films from your PC, Tablet and Smartphone to your HD TV, by plugging it to its HDMI port. Also you can cast a webpage that you are in your PC (not sure if it is possible to do the same with your cellphone).Only one thing, not groovy at all, sometimes there is a delay or freeze between the video you are casting and the TV, and some Youtube playlist does not play all the songs...
